Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.3 Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka » 13.3.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 13.3.5.1--4 Paccayacatukka
Ārammaṇa
Piṭṭhiduka
Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayacatukka
Ārammaṇa
65.
4211Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā…  tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
4212Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
4213Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Paṭiccasadisaṃ.) (2)
4214Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Paṭiccasadisaṃ, saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
66.
4215Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve, anantare cha (sabbattha cha), vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate cha.
4216Anulomaṃ.
